effect.sun_moon: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns. Pokémon other than shadow Pokémon take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn. This move is typeless for the purposes of weather ball.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns. Pokémon other than shadow Pokémon take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn. This move is typeless for the purposes of weather ball.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns. Pokémon other than shadow Pokémon take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn. This move is typeless for the purposes of weather ball.

short_effect.sun_moon: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns.
